programme.title: Doug Less I

programme.title: Doug Less II

programme.title: King Pong

programme.title: Dreading Vows

programme.title: Nocturnal Omission
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E05, Doug decides not to ruin Deacon's weekend with a beautiful stewardess by telling him about his ex-wife's plans.

programme.title: Affidavit Justice

programme.title: Secret Garden
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E07, Carrie's relationship with her gynecologist (Judge Reinhold) is in jeopardy when Doug's cousin charges the doctor more than he quoted for landscaping work.

programme.title: Eggsit Strategy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E08, After hearing of possible layoffs at her law firm, Carrie begins to worry about her own job security; Doug loses Deacon's lucky Koosh ball.

programme.title: Thanks, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E09, An unexpected visit from a stranger interrupts the Heffernans' Thanksgiving dinner. Lou Ferrigno and Merrin Dungey guest star.

programme.title: American Idle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E10, Doug gets annoyed after Carrie loses her job, becomes extremely unmotivated and lazes around the house.

programme.title: Santa Claustrophobia
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E11, Carrie drives Doug crazy when she takes a part-time job at IPS during the holiday season; Arthur tries to bring everyone together for a Christmas portrait.

programme.title: Dougie Houser
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E12, Carrie reminds Doug of a past incident at their first house when he wants to buy a chainsaw from an infomercial.

programme.title: Frigid Heirs
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E13, After Arthur wins $2,500 playing bingo, a dispute erupts over how the money should be spent; Doug wants to purchase golf clubs, while Carrie would like to go to a day spa.

programme.title: Switch Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E14, Deacon and Kelly decide to take Arthur out to dinner so Doug and Carrie can be alone, but they ignore a warning about Arthur's reaction to spicy food.

programme.title: Cheap Saks
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E15, Carrie discovers Doug's annoying ex-girlfriend (Janeane Garofalo) has an employee discount at Saks Fifth Avenue.

programme.title: Damned Yanky

programme.title: Multiple Plots
programme.desc: King of Queens, S06E17, Carrie, still unemployed, helps Holly with dog walking; Arthur sells his burial plot to Spence's mother, Veronica (Anne Meara).

programme.title: Trash Talker

programme.title: Entertainment Weakly

programme.title: Name Dropper

programme.title: Offtrack...Bedding
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E06, Doug goes looking for his father at a model train convention and notices his mother with very seductive Arthur Spooner.

programme.title: Silent Mite
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E07, Doug and Arthur play detective when Doug suspects an admirer of Carrie has stolen his wallet.

programme.title: Awed Couple

programme.title: Cologne Ranger
programme.desc: King of Queens, S07E09, Doug wears a cologne Carrie dislikes to try to convince himself and the guys that she does not control him.

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance

programme.title: Pour Judgement

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Flight Status
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Flight Status, S03E03, The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive, 20160101080000 +0000, The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Orbit
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Orbit, S02E03, The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Hyabusa, S04E05, The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Milky Way

programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E45, Dead women and mutilated mannequins pop up in a Texas town. And it will take a broken window, a pizza box, and a few stray hairs to track down a homicidal postman.

programme.title: Sex, Lies & Smoothies
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E23, A rich Canadian expat in Dubai reports that her husband is missing. And detectives soon find his decomposing body in a box in the building's utility room.

programme.title: Episode 152
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E52, A small town celebrity goes missing, just as body parts start tuning up around town.

programme.title: Who Done It?
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E05, A dead body discovered outside of a church leads to a world of sex, drugs, and Halloween pranks.

programme.title: Washington Sniper

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E01, The Doctor and his companions arrive in a London very different from what they remember.

programme.title: The Daleks
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E02, The Doctor and Ian are captured and taken to the Dalek ship.

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E03, Hiding on board the Dalek spaceship, Ian is taken to the mines of Bedfordshire.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E04, The Doctor, Susan and David discover a nearby firebomb, left by Robomen to destroy London.

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E05, Ian and his friend Larry are chased by the Slyther, protecting the Bedfordshire mines.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Dalek Invasion, S01E06, Barbara realises how to control the Robomen and orders an attack on the Daleks.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: The Web Planet
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E01, The TARDIS lands on a planet that affects its systems. The Doctor and his companions must save the ship, while assisting an oppressed alien race to regain control of their world.

programme.title: The Zarbi
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E02, The Doctor, Ian and Vicki have been captured by the Zarbi and taken into a control centre.

programme.title: Escape to Danger
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E03, Ian and the Menoptra Vrestin try to escape the pursuing Zarbi but the ground gives way beneath them what will the Zarbi do next?

programme.title: Crater of Needles
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E04, Barbara and Prapillus are caught in the middle of fighting between the menoptra and the Zarbi they find themselves surrounded, how will they escape?

programme.title: Invasion
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E05, Returning to the Carsenome with the Menoptra's isop-tope device, the Doctor and Vicki are herded into a chamber where they are enveloped in a web-like substance, what next for the Doctor.

programme.title: The Centre
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E06, The TARDIS dematerialises from the surface of Vortis. Prapillus vows that the Earth people will never be forgotten and warns that the Animus must never again be allowed to take root on the planet.

programme.title: The Executioners
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E01, Ian and Vicki are trapped by tentacled creatures on the planet Aridius. The Doctor and Barbara witness Daleks leaving Skaro on a mission to eliminate the Doctor and his companions.

programme.title: The Death of Time
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E02, The Doctor and his friends have been given shelter from the Daleks by the Aridians. But the Daleks threaten to kill the Aridians unless they hand over the time travellers.

programme.title: Flight Through Eternity
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E03, The Daleks pursue the TARDIS through time and space. In an attempt to lose the Daleks, the Doctor makes a stop on the top of the Empire State Building and then on a sailing ship.

programme.title: Journey into Terror
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E04, With the Daleks in pursuit, the TARDIS lands in what appears to be a haunted house. When the Daleks arrive, the travellers depart, not realising that they have left Vicki behind!

programme.title: The Death of Doctor Who
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E05, The Daleks follow the TARDIS to the jungle world of Mechanus which is infested with lethal plants. There the Daleks release a robot double of the Doctor that is programmed to kill.

programme.title: The Planet of Decision
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E06, The Doctor and his friends are taken prisoner by the Mechonoids. There they meet fellow prisoner, Steven Taylor. The Daleks break into the Mechonoid city and a battle commences.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Power of the Daleks, S01E01, Ben and Polly suspect that the 'new' Doctor is really an imposter. The TARDIS lands on the planet Vulcan where a murder has been committed.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Series, Science fiction

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

programme.title: Wild Rebels
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Wild Rebels, S03E07, A retired race car driver, talked into going undercover by the police, joins a biker gang and must serve as the getaway car driver.

programme.title: The Brute Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man, S07E02, Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a “The Creeper,” who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy, 19891118000000 +0000, Scientists search for the ancient breastplate of a mummy, culminating in a mad scientist's attempt to fight the creature through the construction of a robot.
The Giant Gila Monster, 20020612000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E108, Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.

MST3K: Time Chasers, 19971121000000 +0000, A college professor and a reporter go through time in a modified light plane to stop a corporation from using his invention to accidentally create a dystopian future.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.
MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die, 19931030000000 +0000, New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

MST3K: Master Ninja I, 19920111000000 +0000, The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.
MST3K: Master Ninja II, 19920125000000 +0000, Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).

Kitten Bowl, 20140202000000 +0000, The greatest feline showdown in cable television history! The competition will consist of two preliminary playoffs and a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern and John Sterling.
Kitten Bowl II, 20150201000000 +0000, A feline competition featuring two preliminary rounds followed by a championship match. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl III, 20160207000000 +0000, Hallmark Channel presents the nation's most athletic, adorable and adoptable kittens in a claws-out, paws-out showdown for Kitten Bowl III. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.
Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: The Long Goodbye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E16, The team discover two life pods floating in space. Upon further investigation, the team accidentally transfers the minds of the individuals into Sheppard and Weir. Things get worse when the team discovers the two people are out to destroy the other.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E02, With the need for food and water becoming dire, Dr. Rush manages to find a planet within range that seems viable but can only be accessed by shuttle. When nearing the planet, they encounter violent turbulence and must make a dangerous crash landing.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Pathogen
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E04, On Destiny, Chloe's behavior has become a cause of concern and a worried Scott makes a shocking discovery while searching her quarters: a journal with Alien script. He shows it to Young and Rush who decide they must keep a constant eye on Chloe.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E15, When SGC commander Gen. Hammond steps down saying he's too old for the job, SG-1 suspects foul play. When a hard-nosed new general steps in to replace him and splits up SG-1, they vow to solve the mystery and get their beloved General back.

Stargate SG-1, S04E16, A decade in the future, Earth's alliance with a highly intelligent race of aliens has rendered SGC obsolete. But when Carter, now married to an ambassador, uncovers a terrifying secret, she must reassemble SG-1 to send an urgent message to the past.

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E17, When a chosen boy is brought to SGC, he sends a telepathic message, causing Daniel's personality to undergo disturbing changes. Will the rest of SG-1 be able to solve the mystery of the boy's origin before he becomes a power-hungry warmonger?

programme.title: The Light
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E18, SG-1 travels to a planet to investigate a machine that induces narcotic pleasure. But when they try to leave the planet, they are overcome with debilitating withdrawal symptoms, forcing them to stay. Can they free themselves from this addiction?

programme.title: Prodigy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E19, Carter takes a young cadet under her wing on a mission to a remote planet inhabited by unique electronic beings. But when the creatures suddenly turn aggressive, SG-1 will need the cadet's brainpower to help them escape with their lives!

programme.title: Entity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E20, When SG-1 sends a probe through the Stargate, a powerful electronic impulse comes back through and hides inside SGC's computer. But when the entity suddenly jumps inside Carter's mind, SG-1 must choose between saving SGC and saving Carter's life!

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E21, SG-1 encounters a tricky situation when they join forces with androids designed to look like them in a battle against an evil Goa'uld System Lord. Can they fight alongside robotic doppelgangers, or will confusion and contradiction blur the line?

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Coming Out, Getting Out, Going Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E24, Valerie puts the club up as collateral to bail Colin out of jail. Kelly comes home from rehab and Donna is put off by the frequent phone calls from a lonely Tara. Clare, Susan, Brandon and Steve organize a romantic evening for the Nat and Joan.

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E25, Rush dumps Ryan and Austin off on Steve on the same day that he is hosting a fraternity party. Kelly invites Tara to stay with her after she finishes her stint in rehab.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E26, Brandon, Steve, and Joe go on a camping trip with Susan, Clare, and Donna. The girls become jealous when the guys repeatedly ignore them to help some damsels in distress. Tara sabotages Kelly's relationship with Greg.

programme.title: Ticket To Ride

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E09, Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E10, Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E11, Mitch falls for the beautiful woman he saved from drowning after she drove her car off a cliff, unaware that she's a cold-blooded murderer and con artist who was attempting to dispose of the murder victim of her latest scam when Mitch rescued her.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E12, Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their twenty-year high school reunion with unforeseen results. Eddie discovers an abandoned baby under his tower with a note imploring him to take care of it for 24 hours.

programme.title: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E13, Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E14, Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E15, A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E16, Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E01, The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E02, A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.
